name: cloudfront-authorization-at-edge
description: Protect downloads of your content hosted on CloudFront with Cognito authentication using Lambda@Edge

scripts.test: echo "Sorry, there aren't any tests"; exit 1
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run webpack
scripts.update-dependencies: for DIR in . $(ls -d src/cfn-custom-resources/*) $(ls -d src/lambda-edge/*); do [[ ! -f ${DIR}/package.json ]] || (cd ${DIR} && echo "Updating ${DIR} ..." && npm --depth 9999 update); done
scripts.postinstall: for DIR in $(ls -d src/cfn-custom-resources/*) $(ls -d src/lambda-edge/*); do [[ ! -f ${DIR}/package.json ]] || (cd ${DIR} && echo "Updating ${DIR} ..." && npm install --ignore-scripts); done
